attributes.action: Close the UK Military base in Brunei and withdraw all UK personnel.
attributes.background: Today Brunei introduced a series of laws and penalties that make anal sex and adultery a crime, punishable by the penalty of being stoned to death. The UK should show its revulsion by closing its military garrison, withdrawing all personnel and ceasing all training operations in Brunei.
